articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to 4th National People's Congress of ZANU-PF
    Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the 4th National People's Congress of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front on November 30.
 The message expressed the belief that the current congress would be an important occasion in consolidating the achievements made by the Zimbabwean government and people in the struggle to reject the interference and pressure of imperialists and defend national sovereignty and interests under the leadership of the union and in further strengthening the union.    
 The message wholeheartedly wished the congress a great success in its work, expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the WPK and the union would continue to develop on good terms.
